comment:
Optimization Problem:This problem involves maximizing or minimizing a certain objective function, in this case, profit, subject to constraints.
Constraint:A restriction that limits the feasible solutions in an optimization problem. In this case, the constraint is the maximum number of hours each machine can run per year.
Objective Function:The function that needs to be optimized in an optimization problem. In this case, the objective function is the profit made from producing batches of hams and pork ribs.
